blogPost.excerpt: Connect with your loved ones and create lasting memories, with video messages from Canva. There’s always an occasion to celebrate, create customized video messages by yourself or with a group and make every moment special.
blogPost.body: Connect with your loved ones and create lasting memories, with video messages from Canva. There’s always an occasion to celebrate, create customized video messages by yourself or with a group and make every moment special.
blogPost.title: Video Messages from Canva - Celebrate any occasion with a group video message.
blogPost.author: Lachlan Andrews

localize.description: 通过Canva提供的视频信息，与您所爱的人保持联系，创造永恒的回忆。总会有庆祝的机会，自己或和团队一起制作定制的视频信息，让每一个时刻都变得特别。
localize.tagline: 用一条集体视频信息来庆祝任何场合。

localize.description: 通過Canva提供的視頻信息，與您所愛的人保持聯繫，創造永恆的回憶。總會有慶祝的機會，自己或和團隊一起製作定製的視頻信息，讓每一個時刻都變得特別。
localize.tagline: 用一條集體視頻信息來慶祝任何場合。

previous.excerpt: Reslash is the most fun way to get together online. Recreate the feel of a Christmas party, virtually. Break away from the stress of zoom calls or the hassle of breakout rooms. It's time to celebrate and have fun this holiday season with Reslash!
previous.title: Reslash for Christmas - Host the best virtual Christmas party ever

localize.description: Reslash是在线聚会最有趣的方式。虚拟地重现圣诞派对的感觉。摆脱变焦电话的压力或分组房间的麻烦。现在是与Reslash一起庆祝和享受这个节日季节的时候了！
localize.tagline: 举办有史以来最棒的虚拟圣诞派对

localize.description: Reslash是在線聚會最有趣的方式。虛擬地重現聖誕派對的感覺。擺脫變焦電話的壓力或分組房間的麻煩。現在是與Reslash一起慶祝和享受這個節日季節的時候了！
localize.tagline: 舉辦有史以來最棒的虛擬聖誕派對

next.excerpt: Postpace is a productivity platform for writers, bloggers, marketers and teams to automate their topic research workflow and rapidly build a content brief. Postpace helps study a topic by analyzing the top 15-20 organic results from Google for any keyword.
next.title: Postpace - Productivity platform for writers, bloggers & teams

localize.description: Postpace是一个生产力平台，供作家、博客作者、营销人员和团队自动化他们的主题研究工作流程，并快速构建内容摘要。Postpace通过分析来自Google的任意关键字的前15-20个有机结果来帮助研究主题。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和团队的生产力平台

localize.description: Postpace是一個生產力平臺，供作家、博客作者、營銷人員和團隊自動化他們的主題研究工作流程，並快速構建內容摘要。Postpace通過分析來自Google的任意關鍵字的前15-20個有機結果來幫助研究主題。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和團隊的生產力平臺
